variables.input:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_device`
| fields tags
| summarize tags = collectDistinct(tags)

0.title: PaloAlto firewalls
0.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.cpu.management.utilization`), t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.sys.uptime`), by: {`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device` | fields id, SystemName, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ SystemName,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=toLong(arrayAvg(`t_cpu`)), avg_upt=arrayAvg(`t_upt`)
| lookup [ timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.hc.in.octets`), t_out=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.hc.out.octets`), by:{ `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface)`} | summarize sum_out = sum(toDouble(t_out)), sum_in = sum(toDouble(t_in)), by: {`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,
    fields:{sum_out, sum_in }
  | lookup sourceField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields Device = SystemName,`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`, lifetime=toString(`lifetime[end]`), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems), avg_upt, SystemName, sum_in, sum_out, avg_cpu
| fieldsRename `Problems #` = problem_count
| fieldsRemove   `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*1000000
| fieldsRemove avg_upt
| filter SystemName != "DUMSYS-10"
| fieldsAdd  `OutTraffic` = sum_out, `InTraffic` = sum_in
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = SystemName, `System Up Time` = DurSys ,`CPU (%)` = avg_cpu, `Last seen` = lifetime
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( `Last seen`  <  now() - 10m, "âš ï¸",else:"âœ…")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` , `Problems #`,`CPU (%)`, `OutTraffic`, `InTraffic`
| sort `Problems #` desc

6.title: Cisco switches and routers
6.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.loadavg.5min`), t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.memory.hc.free`),  t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.sys.uptime`), 
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end],entity.type ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]`, entity.type  }
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=arrayAvg(`t_cpu`), avg_mem=arrayAvg(`t_mem`), avg_upt=arrayAvg(`t_upt`)
| lookup [ timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`), by:{ `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}
| summarize   sum_out = sum(toDouble(t_out)),sum_in = sum(toDouble(t_in)), by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    fields:{sum_out, sum_in }  
| lookup sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields Device = system_name, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(`lifetime[end]`), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems), avg_upt, system_name, sum_in, sum_out, avg_mem, avg_cpu
| fieldsRename `Problems #` = problem_count
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*1000000
| fieldsRemove avg_upt
| fieldsAdd  `OutTraffic` = sum_out, `InTraffic` = sum_in
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `System Up Time` = DurSys , `CPU (%)` = avg_cpu, `Free Memory (KB)` = avg_mem
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( lifetime <  now() -10m, "âš ï¸",else:"âœ…")
| fieldsAdd `Device type` = replaceString(type, "snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_", "")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` ,  `Problems #`, `CPU (%)`, `Free Memory (KB)`, `OutTraffic`, `InTraffic`
| filter `DNS name` != "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| sort `Problems #` desc

8.title: Interfaces in Up/Down state
8.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| fieldsAdd description,type,  opStatus, adminStatus
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`] ,
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id, entity.name
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_system_name,Interface=description
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" AND adminStatus == "up(1)"
| append [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd Name, Status,EnabledState
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`],
    lookupField:id,
    prefix: "rtr_"
| fieldsRemove rtr_id, id, entity.name
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = rtr_NodeName,Interface=Name,opStatus=Status,adminStatus=EnabledState
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(1)" AND adminStatus == "true(1)"]

18.title: Top interfaces Inbound load
18.query:
timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`),  t_speed=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.highspeed`), by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`},interval:1m
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove   `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `InLoad`=  8*100*t_ino[]/(power(10, 6)*tolong(t_speed[]))/(interval/1s)
| fieldsAdd SumLoad = arraySum(`InLoad`)
| sort SumLoad desc
| limit 10
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_ino,t_speed,SumLoad

19.title: Top interfaces Outbound load
19.query:
timeseries t_ouo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`),  t_speed=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.highspeed`),by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`},rate:1m
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove   `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `OutLoad`= 8*100*t_ouo[]/(power(10, 6)*tolong(t_speed[]))/(interval/1s)
| fieldsAdd SumLoad = arraySum(`OutLoad`)
| sort SumLoad desc
| limit 10
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_ouo,t_speed,SumLoad

20.title: Top interfaces traffic
20.query:
timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`), t_ouo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`}
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, type, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsAdd avg_in=arrayAvg(`t_ino`),avg_out=arrayAvg(t_ouo)
| fieldsAdd `In Bytes`= tolong(avg_in), `Out Bytes` = tolong(avg_out)
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=description
| fieldsRemove timeframe, t_ino, t_ouo,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`, interval,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In Bytes`, `Out Bytes`

| append [timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.bits`),  t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.bits`),by: { `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`| fields id,entity.name , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ entity.name, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsAdd avg_in=arrayAvg(`t_ino`),avg_out=arrayAvg(t_outo)
| fieldsAdd `In Bytes`= tolong(avg_in*8), `Out Bytes` = tolong(avg_out*8)
| fieldsRemove  timeframe, t_ino, t_outo,interval,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`,`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]` 
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=entity.name
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In Bytes`, `Out Bytes`]

| append [timeseries t_ino=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.in.octets`, rate:1s), t_out=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.if.out.octets`, rate:1s), by:{`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`}
| filter isNotNull(`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`)
| fieldsAdd sum_traffic_in= tolong(arraySum(t_ino)),sum_traffic_out= tolong(arraySum(t_out))
|  fields `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`,sum_traffic_in,sum_traffic_out
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`| fields id,InterfaceDescription, runs_on[`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`]] ,
    sourceField: `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  InterfaceDescription, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`| fields id, SystemName],
    sourceField:`runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ SystemName } 
| filter SystemName != "DUMSYS-10"
| fieldsAdd `In Bytes`= tolong(sum_traffic_in), `Out Bytes` = tolong(sum_traffic_out)
| fieldsRemove `runs_on[\`dt.entity.palo-alto:device\`]` ,`dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = SystemName,Interface=InterfaceDescription
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In Bytes`, `Out Bytes`]

| append [timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.in.count`),  t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`),by: {`dt.entity.f5:interface`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`| fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:`runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }    
| fieldsAdd avg_in=arrayAvg(`t_ino`),avg_out=arrayAvg(t_outo)
| fieldsAdd `In Bytes`= tolong(avg_in), `Out Bytes` = tolong(avg_out)
| fieldsRemove  timeframe, t_ino, t_outo,interval,`dt.entity.f5:interface`,`runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]` 
| fieldsRename  `DNS name` = NodeName,Interface=Name
| fields `DNS name`, Interface, `In Bytes`, `Out Bytes`]
| sort `In Bytes`+ `Out Bytes` desc
| limit 10

21.title: Top interfaces discards and errors
21.query:
timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.discards`),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.out.discards`),
 t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.in.errors`),t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.out.errors`),
by: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, type, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsAdd avg_indiscards=arrayAvg(`t_indiscards`),avg_outdiscards=arrayAvg(`t_outdiscards`),avg_inerrors=arrayAvg(`t_inerrors`),avg_outerrors=arrayAvg(`t_outerrors`)
| fieldsAdd sum_trouble = avg_indiscards + avg_outdiscards + avg_inerrors + avg_outerrors
| fieldsRemove  type, timeframe, t_indiscards, t_outdiscards,t_inerrors, t_outerrors,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`, interval,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=description
| fieldsRename InDiscards = avg_indiscards, OutDiscards = avg_outdiscards, InErrors = avg_inerrors, OutErrors = avg_outerrors
| fields `DNS name`,Interface,InDiscards,OutDiscards,InErrors,OutErrors,sum_trouble
| append [timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.drops.in.count`),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.drops.out.count`),
 t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.errors.in.count`),t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.errors.out.count`),
by: `dt.entity.f5:interface`
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.f5:interface` | fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField: `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }    
| fieldsAdd avg_indiscards=arrayAvg(`t_indiscards`),avg_outdiscards=arrayAvg(`t_outdiscards`),avg_inerrors=arrayAvg(`t_inerrors`),avg_outerrors=arrayAvg(`t_outerrors`)
| fieldsAdd sum_trouble = avg_indiscards + avg_outdiscards + avg_inerrors + avg_outerrors
| fieldsRemove  timeframe, t_indiscards, t_outdiscards,t_inerrors, t_outerrors,`dt.entity.f5:interface`, interval,  `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = NodeName,Interface=Name
| fieldsRename InDiscards = avg_indiscards, OutDiscards = avg_outdiscards, InErrors = avg_inerrors, OutErrors = avg_outerrors
| fields `DNS name`,Interface,InDiscards,OutDiscards,InErrors,OutErrors,sum_trouble]
| append [timeseries t_indiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.discards.count`),t_outdiscards=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.discards.count`),
 t_inerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.err.count`),t_outerrors=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.err.count`),
by: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface` | fields id, if_descr , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  if_descr, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]`}
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField: `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsAdd avg_indiscards=arrayAvg(`t_indiscards`)/(interval/1s),avg_outdiscards=arrayAvg(`t_outdiscards`)/(interval/1s),avg_inerrors=arrayAvg(`t_inerrors`)/(interval/1s),avg_outerrors=arrayAvg(`t_outerrors`)/(interval/1s)
| fieldsAdd sum_trouble = avg_indiscards + avg_outdiscards + avg_inerrors + avg_outerrors
| fieldsRemove  timeframe, t_indiscards, t_outdiscards,t_inerrors, t_outerrors,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`, interval,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device\`]`
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = system_name,Interface=if_descr
| fieldsRename InDiscards = avg_indiscards, OutDiscards = avg_outdiscards, InErrors = avg_inerrors, OutErrors = avg_outerrors
| fields `DNS name`,Interface,InDiscards,OutDiscards,InErrors,OutErrors,sum_trouble]
| sort sum_trouble desc
| fieldsRemove sum_trouble
| limit 10

23.title: Top interfaces Inbound traffic
23.query:
timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.in.octets.count`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`},interval:1m
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, type, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ type, description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove  type, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `InLoad b/s` = t_ino[]*8/(interval/1s)
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_ino
| append [timeseries t_ino=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.in.count`), by: {`dt.entity.f5:interface`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`| fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:`runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }    
| fieldsRemove  `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,`dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( Name,"-",NodeName ), `InLoad b/s` = t_ino[]*8/(interval/1s)
| fieldsRemove Name,NodeName, t_ino]
| sort `InLoad b/s` desc
| limit 10

24.title: Top interfaces Outbound traffic
24.query:
timeseries t_outo=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.if.hc.out.octets.count` ),by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`},interval:1m
| lookup [fetch`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface` | fields id, description , child_of[`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`]],
    sourceField: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{  description, `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| fieldsRemove   `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`,  `child_of[\`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device\`]`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( description,"-",system_name ), `OutLoad` = t_outo[]*8/(interval/1s)
| fieldsRemove description,system_name, t_outo
| append [timeseries t_outo=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`), by: {`dt.entity.f5:interface`},interval:1m
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`| fields id, Name , runs_on[`dt.entity.f5:instance`]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:interface`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ Name, `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]` }
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.f5:instance`| fields id, NodeName],
    sourceField:`runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ NodeName }    
| fieldsRemove  `runs_on[\`dt.entity.f5:instance\`]`,`dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd `Interface` = concat( Name,"-",NodeName ), `OutLoad` = t_outo[]*8/(interval/1s)
| fieldsRemove Name,NodeName, t_outo]
| sort `OutLoad` desc
| limit 10

25.title: Top devices CPU usage
25.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.loadavg.5min`),
by: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, system_name, lifetime[end] ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{system_name,`lifetime[end]` }
| filter system_name != "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `CPU (%)` = t_cpu
| fieldsRemove  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`

| append [timeseries  t_cpum=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.cpu.management.utilization`),  t_cpus=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.palo-alto.generic.cpu.system.utilization`), by: {`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device` | fields id, SystemName, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ SystemName,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsadd `CPU (%)` = tolong(100-t_cpum[]-t_cpus[])
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=SystemName
| fieldsRemove `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`,t_cpum,t_cpus]

| append [timeseries  t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.routingengine.cpu.utilization`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device` | fields id,  system_name, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{system_name,`lifetime[end]`}
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `CPU (%)` = t_cpu
| fieldsRemove `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`]

| append [timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.global.host.cpu.user1m`),
by: {`dt.entity.f5:instance`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance` | fields id, NodeName, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{NodeName,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=NodeName, `CPU (%)` = t_cpu
| fieldsRemove  `dt.entity.f5:instance`]

| sort `CPU (%)` desc
| limit 10

29.title: Top Cisco routers and switches temperature
29.query:
timeseries t_temp=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.envmon.temperature.status.value`),
by: { `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`}| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end] ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `Device Temperature` = t_temp
| fieldsRemove entity.name, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`, `lifetime[end]`
| sort `Device Temperature` desc
| limit 10

32.title: F5 BIG-IP load balancers
32.query:
timeseries t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.global.host.cpu.user1m`), t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.host.memory.used`),  t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.uptime`), 
by: {`dt.entity.f5:instance`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance` | fields id, entity.name, NodeName, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,NodeName,`lifetime[end]`}
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=arrayAvg(`t_cpu`), avg_mem=arrayAvg(`t_mem`), avg_upt=arrayAvg(`t_upt`)
| lookup [ timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.out.count`), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.interface.stat.bytes.in.count`), by:{ `dt.entity.f5:instance`,`dt.entity.f5:interface`} | summarize   sum_out = sum(toDouble(t_out)),sum_in = sum(toDouble(t_in)), by: {`dt.entity.f5:instance`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
    fields:{sum_out, sum_in }
| lookup sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields Device = NodeName, `dt.entity.f5:instance`, name=entity.name, lifetime=toString(`lifetime[end]`), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems), avg_upt, NodeName, sum_in, sum_out, avg_mem, avg_cpu
| fieldsRename `Problems #` = problem_count
| fieldsRemove `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*1000000
| filter NodeName != "ip-10-0-11-88.ec2.internal"
| fieldsAdd  `OutTraffic` = tolong(sum_out), `InTraffic` = tolong(sum_in)
| fieldsRename `DNS name`= NodeName, `System Up Time` = DurSys , `CPU (%)` = avg_cpu, `Free Memory` = avg_mem
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( lifetime <  now() -10m, "âš ï¸",else:"âœ…")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` ,  `Problems #`, `CPU (%)`, `Free Memory`, `OutTraffic`, `InTraffic`
| sort `Problems #` desc

36.title: Cisco routers and switches Power  Supply state
36.query:
timeseries t_ps=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.power_supply.state`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,ps.label, ps.status}
| fieldsAdd LastState=arraylast(`t_ps`)
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| filter system_name != "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| filter LastState == 1 and isNotNull(ps.label)
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = system_name , `PSU Name` = ps.label
| fieldsRemove t_ps, timeframe,interval,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,LastState
| fieldsAdd `PSU State`=  if(ps.status   == "normal(1)" ,"ðŸŸ¢" ,else:"ðŸ”´" )
| fields `DNS name`, `PSU Name`, `PSU State`
| sort `PSU State` asc

38.title: Davis monitored  Network device metrics Health
38.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems) 
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )
|append[fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )]
|append[fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )]
|append[fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device` 
| lookup sourceField: id, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields id, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(lifetime), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems)
| fieldsRemove id, lifetime, type
| summarize result = sum(problem_count )]
| summarize countdown=sum(result)
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( countdown  == 0 , "ðŸŸ¢",else:"ðŸ”´")

39.title: Interface desired status
39.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_network_interface`
| fieldsAdd   opStatus, adminStatus
| filter opStatus == "down(2)" and adminStatus == "up(1)"
| summarize updown=count()
| append [fetch `dt.entity.f5:interface`
| fieldsAdd  Status,EnabledState
| filter Status == "down(2)" and EnabledState == "up(1)"
| fieldsRename  opStatus=Status,adminStatus=EnabledState
| summarize updown=count()]
| append [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:interface`
| fieldsAdd  IFOperatingStatus, InterfaceAdminStatus
| filter IFOperatingStatus == "down(2)" and InterfaceAdminStatus =="up(1)"
| fieldsRename  opStatus=IFOperatingStatus,adminStatus=InterfaceAdminStatus
| summarize updown=count()]
| append [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`
| fieldsAdd if_adminstatus,if_operstatus
| filter if_operstatus == "down(2)" and if_adminstatus == "up(1)"
| fieldsRename  opStatus=if_operstatus,adminStatus=if_adminstatus
| summarize updown=count()]
| summarize countdown=sum(updown)
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( countdown == 0 , "ðŸŸ¢",else:"ðŸ”´")

40.title: Network devices monitoring health
40.query:
fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| filter lifetime[end]  <  now() - 5m
| summarize down=count()
|append [fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance`
| filter lifetime[end]  <  now() - 5m
| summarize down=count()]
|append [fetch `dt.entity.palo-alto:device`
| filter lifetime[end]  <  now() - 5m
| summarize down=count()]
|append [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`
| filter lifetime[end]  <  now() - 5m
| summarize down=count()]
| summarize countdown=sum(down)
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( countdown == 0 , "ðŸŸ¢",else:"ðŸ”´")

41.title: Network devices hardware health
41.query:
timeseries t_fs=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.envmon.fan.state`),by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,envmon.fan.status,envmon.fan.status.descr}
| fieldsAdd LastFanState=arraylast(`t_fs`)
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }   
| filter LastFanState == 1 and isnotnull( envmon.fan.status.descr)
| filter system_name == "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| filter envmon.fan.status ==  "critical(3)"   
| summarize HHealth=count()
|append [timeseries t_ps=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.power_supply.state`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,ps.label, ps.status}
| fieldsAdd LastPSUState=arraylast(`t_ps`)
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| filter system_name != "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| filter LastPSUState == 1 and isnotnull(ps.label)
| filter ps.status ==  "critical(3)"   
| summarize HHealth=count()]
| summarize critical=sum(HHealth)
| fieldsAdd `Hardware`=  if(critical==0,  "ðŸŸ¢",else: "ðŸ”´")

43.title: Top devices  memory usage
43.query:
timeseries t_free=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.memory.hc.free`),t_used=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.cpm.cpu.memory.hc.used`),
by: `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device` | fields id, system_name, lifetime[end] ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{system_name,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsadd `Used Memory (%)` = 100*(t_used[]/(t_free[]+ t_used[]))
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name
| fieldsRemove  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,t_free,t_used

| append [timeseries t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.routingengine.memory.utilization`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device` | fields id,  system_name, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{system_name,`lifetime[end]`}
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `Used Memory (%)` = t_mem
| fieldsRemove `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`]

| append [timeseries t_used=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.host.memory.used`),t_free=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.f5.bigip.sys.host.memory.free`),
by: {`dt.entity.f5:instance`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.f5:instance` | fields id, NodeName, lifetime[end]],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.f5:instance`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{NodeName,`lifetime[end]` }
| fieldsadd `Used Memory (%)` = 100*(t_used[]/(t_free[]+ t_used[]))
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=NodeName
| fieldsRemove  `dt.entity.f5:instance`,t_used,t_free]
| sort `Used Memory (%)` desc
| limit 10

45.title: Juniper routers
45.query:
timeseries  t_upt=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.device.sys.uptime.count`),t_cpu=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.routingengine.cpu.utilization`),t_mem=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.routingengine.memory.utilization`),
by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`}
| lookup [fetch `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device` | fields id, entity.name, system_name, lifetime[end],entity.type ],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{entity.name,system_name,`lifetime[end]`, entity.type}
| fieldsAdd avg_cpu=toLong(arrayAvg(`t_cpu`)), avg_mem=arrayAvg(`t_mem`), avg_upt=arrayAvg(`t_upt`)
| lookup [ timeseries t_in=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.in.bits`), t_out=avg(`com.dynatrace.extension.juniper.generic.if.out.bits`), by:{ `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`,`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_network_interface`} | summarize   sum_out = sum(toDouble(t_out)),sum_in = sum(toDouble(t_in)), by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`}],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`,
      lookupField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`,
    fields:{sum_out, sum_in }  
| lookup sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`, lookupField: affected_id, fields: {problems},
 [fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" | fieldsAdd affected_entity_id = affected_entity_ids[0] | summarize collectDistinct(event.status), by:{display_id, affected_entity_id}, alias:problem_status | filter NOT in(problem_status, "CLOSED")| summarize problems = count(), by: {affected_id = affected_entity_id}]
| fields Device = system_name, `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_juniper_device`, name=entity.name, type=entity.type, lifetime=toString(`lifetime[end]`), problem_count = if(isNull(problems), 0, else: problems), avg_upt, system_name, sum_in, sum_out, avg_mem, avg_cpu
| fieldsAdd DurSys = toDuration(avg_upt)*10000000
| fieldsAdd  `OutTraffic` = sum_out, `InTraffic` = sum_in
| fieldsRename `DNS name`=system_name, `System Up Time` = DurSys ,  `CPU (%)` = avg_cpu, `Free Memory (KB)` = avg_mem, `Problems #` = problem_count
| fieldsAdd `Monitoring status` =  if( lifetime <  now() - 10m, "âš ï¸",else:"âœ…")
| fields `DNS name`,  `Monitoring status`, `System Up Time` ,  `Problems #`, `CPU (%)`, `Free Memory (KB)`, `OutTraffic`, `InTraffic`
| sort `Problems #` desc

46.title: Cisco routers and switches  Fans state
46.query:
timeseries t_fs=avg( `com.dynatrace.extension.snmp-generic-cisco-device.envmon.fan.state`),by: {`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,envmon.fan.status,envmon.fan.status.descr}
| fieldsAdd LastState=arraylast(`t_fs`)
| lookup [fetch  `dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`| fields id, system_name],
    sourceField:`dt.entity.snmp:com_dynatrace_extension_snmp_generic_cisco_device`,
    lookupField:id,
    fields:{ system_name }    
| filter system_name != "AT1i-SW-snmptest.dynatrace.org"
| fieldsRename `DNS name` = system_name 
| fieldsRemove t_fs, timeframe,interval
| filter LastState == 1
| fieldsAdd `Fan State`=  if(envmon.fan.status   == "critical(3)" , "ðŸ”´" ,else:"ðŸŸ¢")
| fieldsRename `Fan Description`=`envmon.fan.status.descr`
| fields `DNS name`,`Fan Description`, `Fan State`
| sort `Fan State` asc
